column7: Good Saturday evening considering the amount of guests at the same time

Had a great family evening here, with some pretty good food. Lots of stuff to chose from, with gambas and patatas bravas being my fave for the evening. Also, a cosy atmosphere and a super friendly staff!

column7: Tasty tapas, wines and super service!
column9: We enjoyed a number of excellent tapas accompanied by a nice glass of wine. We selected 6 different tapas, which were all very good. The service is excellent: friendly, attentive and informal in a pleasant way. We will go again!

Dined with two colleagues on a Tuesday evening; the food was good, service attentive and the atmosphere very pleasant. It's slightly "Swedished" Spanish food, but good nonetheless and well worth a visit.

This is ny absolute favourite restaurant in Lund. They serve authentic spanish food, both modern and tranditional. Try the meatballs and the fried feta cheese. You'll be in for a treat! The service is really good as well! Never ever disappointed.
